body.p:
IRC chat on Freenode:.
The gentoo developers and helpers run the following channels for mutual benefit, it is purely voluntary, and open to everyone. Feel free to pop in and say hello!
General Channels
#gentoo General Discussion
#gentoo-dev Development Only Discussion
#gentoo-user Low-bandwidth chat
#gentoo-server Server related chat
#gentoo-laptop Laptop related chat
#gentoo-embedded Embedded Gentoo Linux
#gentoo-hardened Hardened Gentoo Linux
#gentoo-java Java related chat
#gentoo-games Game Discussions/Support
Platform Specific/support channels
#gentoo-ppc Gentoo Linux/PPC
#gentoo-sparc Gentoo Linux/Sparc
#gentoo-mips Gentoo Linux/MIPS
#gentoo-alpha Gentoo Linux/Alpha
#gentoo-arm Gentoo Linux/ARM
#gentoo-hppa Gentoo Linux/HPPA
#gentoo-hurd Gentoo Hurd
#gentoo-osx Gentoo Linux/OSX
#gentoo-ia64 Gentoo Linux/IA-64
